name: ENGINEERING PHYSICS
topics: PROPERTIES OF MATTER: Elasticity, Stress-Strain Curve, Cantilever, Uniform and Non-Uniform Bending, Torsion, Viscosity, Surface Tension
WAVES AND OPTICS: Oscillations, Wave Motion, Ultrasonics, Interference, Diffraction, Polarization
QUANTUM PHYSICS AND LASERS: Quantum Mechanics, Wave-Particle Duality, Schrödinger's Wave Equation, Lasers, Types of Lasers, Applications of Lasers
CRYSTAL PHYSICS: Crystalline and Amorphous Solids, Unit Cell, Bravais Lattices, Miller Indices, Crystal Structures, X-ray Diffraction, Crystal Imperfections
SEMICONDUCTOR PHYSICS: Semiconductors, Fermi Level, Hall Effect, PN Junction Diode, Zener Diode, Light Emitting Diode (LED), Photodiode, Solar Cell

name: Academic FAQ
topics: Exam dates
Free study resources

name: BASIC ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
topics: ELECTRICAL CIRCUITS AND MEASUREMENTS: Ohm's Law, Kirchhoff's Laws, Network Theorems, AC Circuits, Three-Phase Systems, Measurements
ELECTRICAL MACHINES: Transformers, DC Machines, AC Motors, Alternators (Synchronous Generators)

SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICES AND APPLICATIONS: PN Junction Diode, Rectifiers, Zener Diode, Bipolar Junction Transistors (BJTs), Transistor as an Amplifier, Field Effect Transistors (FETs), Applications of Transistors
DIGITAL ELECTRONICS: Number Systems, Boolean Algebra, Logic Gates, K-Maps, Combinational Circuits, Sequential Circuits
FUNDAMENTALS OF COMMUNICATION ENGINEERING: Communication System, Modulation, Demodulation, Analog Communication, Digital Communication, Multiplexing, Transmitters and Receivers, Antennas, Acoustics

name: Botany
topics: Plant Morphology
Taxonomy
Photosynthesis

name: Chemistry
topics: Periodic Classification
Chemical Bonding
Organic Chemistry

name: Civics (Political Science)
topics: Indian Constitution
Governance

name: Computer Science and Technology
topics: Fundamentals of Computers
Programming
Data Structures

name: Economics
topics: Microeconomics
Macroeconomics

name: ENGINEERING CHEMISTRY
topics: WATER TECHNOLOGY AND SURFACE CHEMISTRY: Water Technology, Hardness of Water, Softening Methods, Demineralization, Boiler Feed Water, Surface Chemistry, Applications of Adsorption
ELECTROCHEMISTRY AND CORROSION: Electrochemistry, Nernst Equation, Reference Electrodes, Ion-Selective Electrodes, Batteries, Corrosion, Mechanism of Corrosion, Corrosion Control Methods
FUELS AND COMBUSTION: Fuels, Solid Fuels, Liquid Fuels, Gaseous Fuels, Combustion, Flue Gas Analysis

POLYMERS AND COMPOSITE MATERIALS: Polymers, Properties of Polymers, Important Thermoplastics, Important Thermosets, Elastomers, Conducting Polymers, Composite Materials, Properties and Applications of Composites
NON-CONVENTIONAL ENERGY SOURCES: Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Biomass Energy, Geothermal Energy, Ocean Energy, Hydrogen Energy, Nuclear Energy

name: ENGINEERING MATHEMATICS I
topics: MATRICES: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors, Cayley-Hamilton Theorem, Diagonalization of matrices, Quadratic Forms, Real Symmetric Matrices
VECTOR CALCULUS: Gradient, Divergence and Curl, Directional Derivatives, Line Integral, Surface Integral, Volume Integral, Irrotational and Solenoidal Vector Fields
COMPLEX NUMBERS AND SERIES: Complex Numbers, Series Expansions, Binomial series, Exponential series, Logarithmic series, Fourier Series
MULTIVARIABLE CALCULUS: Partial Derivatives, Total Derivative, Jacobians, Taylor's Series for functions of two variables, Maxima and Minima of functions of two variables

ORDINARY DIFFERENTIAL EQUATIONS: First Order Linear Differential Equations, Homogeneous Differential Equations, Exact Differential Equations, Second Order Linear Differential Equations with Constant Coefficients, Method of Variation of Parameters, Euler-Cauchy Equations, Applications

name: English
topics: English Grammar: parts of speech, tenses, sentence structures (active and passive voice)
Literature: prose, poetry, drama (e.g., 'The Selfish Giant' by Oscar Wilde)

name: ENGLISH FOR TECHNICAL COMMUNICATION
topics: FUNDAMENTALS OF COMMUNICATION: Communication (Definition, process, types), Purpose of Communication, Barriers to Communication, Role of Language, Formal and Informal Communication, Intercultural Communication
WRITING SKILLS FOR ENGINEERS: Technical Writing (Characteristics), Paragraph Writing, Essay Writing, Report Writing, Technical Descriptions, Technical Definitions, Instructions and Manuals
READING AND LISTENING SKILLS: Reading Comprehension, Techniques for effective reading, Critical Reading, Listening Skills, Barriers to Effective Listening, Note-taking Techniques
PRESENTATION SKILLS: Oral Presentation, Audience Analysis, Visual Aids, Delivery Techniques, Handling Questions and Answers, Group Discussions, Public Speaking
PROFESSIONAL COMMUNICATION AND ETHICS: Email Writing, Memorandum (Memo) Writing, Letters, Resumes and Cover Letters, Meeting Skills, Interview Skills, Ethics in Communication, Digital Etiquette

name: Geography
topics: Physical Geography: landforms (e.g., Deccan Plateau), Climate (monsoon patterns)
Human Geography: population distribution (e.g., Tamil Nadu urban areas)

name: History
topics: Mughal Empire: Shah Jahan, Taj Mahal
Indian Freedom Struggle: 1857 Revolt, Mahatma Gandhi, Dandi Salt March

name: Mathematics
topics: Calculus: differentiation (e.g., x^2 to 2x), integration (e.g., 2x to x^2 + C)
Linear Algebra: Matrices (operations, solving systems of equations)
Probability: P(E) = (Number of favorable outcomes)/(Total outcomes)

name: Physics
topics: Mechanics: Newton’s Second Law (F = ma)
Thermodynamics: First Law (ΔU = Q - W)
Waves: frequency, wavelength, speed = frequency × wavelength

name: PROBLEM SOLVING AND PYTHON PROGRAMMING
topics: ALGORITHMIC THINKING AND PROBLEM SOLVING: Algorithms, Flowcharts, Pseudocode, Building Blocks of Algorithms, Problem Solving Techniques, Example Problems
DATA, EXPRESSIONS, STATEMENTS: Python Basics, Variables and Data Types, Operators, Expressions, Statements, Input and Output, Comments, Debugging
CONTROL FLOW, FUNCTIONS, AND MODULES: Control Flow (Conditional Statements, Looping Statements), Functions (Definition, Return values, Local and global variables, Recursion), Modules
LISTS, TUPLES, DICTIONARIES: Lists, Tuples, Dictionaries, Sets, Strings

FILES, EXCEPTIONS, AND PACKAGES: Files (File Operations, Working with text files, CSV files, File paths, os module functions), Exceptions (Error Handling, Common Exceptions, User-defined exceptions), Packages

name: Syllabus
topics: Mathematics: Calculus, Linear Algebra (Due by June 30, 2025)
Physics: Mechanics, Thermodynamics (Due by July 15, 2025)

name: Zoology
topics: Human Physiology: digestive system (e.g., stomach enzymes)
Genetics: inheritance (e.g., Mendel’s laws)
Evolution: natural selection (e.g., Darwin’s finches)
